dcterms:creator: M. Cooke
J. Barker
S. Cunningham
X. Shao
dcterms:description: The Grid Corpus is a widely used benchmark dataset for speech perception and automatic speech recognition, consisting of utterances recited by multiple speakers in a controlled environment.
dcterms:title: Grid Corpus

dcterms:creator: J. Barker
R. Marxer
E. Vincent
S. Watanabe
dcterms:description: CHiME3 is a dataset used for the third CHiME speech separation and recognition challenge, featuring noisy speech data mixed with various background noises at different signal-to-noise ratios.
dcterms:title: CHiME3
